pages.title: Botany Box Recipe
pages.text: $(#25228d)2 Pea, 1 Sproutling, 1 of any leaf, 1 Empty Seed Packet, 200 Sun value.

pages.title: Shooter
pages.text: $(#25228d)Repeater fires two peas at a time.

text: $(br2)$(#bd951a)Repeater is fierce. He's from the streets. He doesn't take attitude from anybody, Plant or Zombie, and he shoots peas to keep people at a distance. Secretly, though, Repeater yearns for love.
